A0: The National Defense Forces of Latvia
RelatedSentence: The National Defense Forces of Latvia have begun a week - long series of military exercises , the largest in the country 's history , the Latvian military announced Monday .
The National Defense Forces of Latvia have begun a week - long series of military exercises , the largest in the country 's history , the Latvian military announced Monday .
Latvian Defense Chief Lt. Gen. Raimonds Graube earlier said that preparations for the event began two and a half years ago .
